102  static arc::str::UTF8String role_to_string(Role role)
103  {
104  std::vector<arc::str::UTF8String> role_strings;
105  if(role & kRoleWindowManager)
106  {
107  role_strings.push_back("window_manager");
108  }
109  if(role & kRoleInput)
110  {
111  role_strings.push_back("input");
112  }
113  if(role & kRoleUI)
114  {
115  role_strings.push_back("ui");
116  }
117  if(role & kRoleRenderer)
118  {
119  role_strings.push_back("renderer");
120  }
121  if(role & kRolePhysics)
122  {
123  role_strings.push_back("physics");
124  }
125  if(role & kRoleAudio)
126  {
127  role_strings.push_back("audio");
128  }
129 
130  return arc::str::join(role_strings, ", ");
131  }
132 
133  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
134  // PUBLIC MEMBER FUNCTIONS
135  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
136 
140  Role get_roles() const
141  {
142  return m_roles;
143  }

154
